title: The 5th Wave
description: Four waves of increasingly deadly alien attacks have left most of Earth decimated. Cassie is on the run, desperately trying to save her younger brother.

title: The Infinite Sea
description: The riveting follow-up to the New York Times bestselling The 5th Wave, hailed by Justin Cronin as “wildly entertaining.”

title: The Last Star
description: The highly-anticipated finale to the New York Times bestselling 5th Wave series.
